alert.note: Alert for Schoolcraft (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued April 15 at 10:03AM EDT until further notice by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY FOR SNOWMELT IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM EDT WEDNESDAY... ...REPLACES FLOOD WARNING... * WHAT...Small stream flooding caused by snowmelt is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central Upper Michigan, including the following county, Schoolcraft. * WHEN...Until 800 AM EDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1003 AM EDT, gauge reports indicated snowmelt. This will cause small stream flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Manistique and M-94 between Steuben and Manistique. - www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
